title: Ask a Doctor: Do Kids Get Long-term Side Effects From COVID Vaccines?
description: A video of Dr. Emma B. Olivera of Advocate Children's Hospital explaining that COVID vaccines do not cause long-term side effects in kids.
sitename: US Department of Health and Human Services
cleaned_text: Ask a Doctor: Do Kids Get Long-term Side Effects From COVID Vaccines? This resource has been archived.
